properties.name: application.db-init-checker
properties.description: The path of file that program will add after initialize the db.

properties.name: rabbitmq.notification.exchange
properties.description: Define the rabbitMQ exchange name for notifications.

properties.name: rabbitmq.notification.queue.add
properties.description: Define the rabbitMQ queue name for notifications add.

properties.name: rabbitmq.notification.queue.remove
properties.description: Define the rabbitMQ queue name for notifications remove.

properties.name: rabbitmq.notification.route.add
properties.description: Define the rabbitMQ route for bind notifications add queue with notification exchange.

properties.name: rabbitmq.notification.route.remove
properties.description: Define the rabbitMQ route for bind notifications remove queue with notification exchange.
